message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving of $100,000 compared to its standard market value. I believe this opportunity will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
